category: Evaluation Committee Regulations/Article 21 (Use of Evaluation Results)
contents: Article 21 (Use of evaluation results) ① The evaluation results according to this regulation are used as follows. Revised 2017. 4. 3., 2020. 11. 5. 1. Organizational management and policy improvement for member sports organizations, etc. 2. Performance improvement support expenses differentiated by grade for organizations that received the top 4 evaluation grades excluding Insufficient. Incentives for labor cost items can be granted, and the amount of support is determined separately by the president, taking into account the opinions of the evaluation committee. 3. Consulting provided to underperforming organizations. 4. Performance improvement support expenses can be reduced for underperforming organizations for three consecutive years. The reduction amount is determined separately by the chairman, taking into account the opinions of the evaluation committee. ② Matters regarding the use of evaluation results can be determined in the evaluation work guidelines under Article 17, Paragraph 1. Revised 2020. 11. 5.
